    Although she restrained herself, some of her own unnoticed habits can still be found, her mastery of combat is very straightforward, it has nothing to do with any type of weapon. It is all for the purpose of destroying the enemy, the art of killing.
char_102_texas.档案资料三:
Regardless of her Lupus status, the obvious fur color, the way she fights and, of course, the name itself, Texas. It all points to the fallen Texas family, a once mighty family whose name is now largely forgotten.
 
    If true, Miss Texas past may be even crazier than most people imagine. The very name itself is a guarantee.
     
    However, even with Rhodes Island network of information, very little is known about the family situation. On the other hand, Miss Texas seems to have no intention of mentioning her past, so at least for the moment, there is no need to dig it up. After all, perhaps it is as she said, that one day her past will catch up with her.
char_102_texas.档案资料四:
The only thing that is certain is that though Miss Texas never mentions her past, she tends to be more indifferent rather than evasive.
 
    It can be clearly seen that she really is well adapted to the life she is living, rather than wanting to escape from it. The mundane work, the boisterous partners, Lungmen, Rhodes Island, that is all her everything now.
     
    It might be asserted:
     
    If Miss Texas past catch up to her, she will take it unflinched. However, if her past were to disrupts her present, then maybe we'll truly witness her anger.

char_166_skfire.临床诊断分析:
Radiography test results showed that the internal organs were clearly defined, no abnormal shadows were found, no abnormalities were found in the detection of originium particles in the circulatory system, no signs of crystalline were found. At this stage, subject is uninfected.

    [Fusion rate of somatic cells and originium] 0%
    
    Operator Skyfire showed no signs of being infected by originium.
    
    [Blood crystal density] 0.11u/L
    
    Operator Skyfire rarely operates in area with concentrated originium.
    
    If I have to comment, then she is just a pure lady who doesn’t know about the world. It’s best to let her suffer a bit so that she understands the danger of the battlefield and the difficulties that the infected face, perhaps secretly prepare some difficult tasks for her to deflate her cuckiness.
    -- Medic Operator Gavial
    
    Gavial, a reminder, medical facility’s checkup report is open to the public.
    -- Kal’tsit
char_166_skfire.档案资料一:
Operator Skyfire’s control of the Arts greatly surpasses those of her age. Skyfire excels at focusing flames into a giant body of pure fire, then rain it down at the target, completely incinerating the enemies.

    During this process, the heat from the fire burns the cloth she is wearing, even her hair accessory will flutter like the flames, yet Skyfire remains unscratched.
    
    Regardless of the extreme heat or the bright light, the art that Skyfire casts was not so different from bringing the sun crashing into the ground and exists as the reason of her code name.
    
    Fact of the matter is, Skyfire who isn’t yet a veteran caster, even if talent, cannot completely control such an enormous power.
    
    Please pay attention to the fire alarms of the area that Skyfire is assigned.
char_166_skfire.档案资料二:
The reason behind “Scepter of the King” and Rhodes Island’s cooperation was just a small matter.

    Yet for members of the Scepter of the King (SotK), it was unforgivable.
    
    The infected of the Reunion Member, during a certain terrorist attack accidentally killed the pet of SotK, “Feare”. This enraged the members. The Reunion Movement of the area never expected that each member are combat geniuses, and remains highly competitive and eager to join combat.
    
    Because of a single pet, or perhaps a family member, the loss of an important friend. SotK retaliated against Reunion Movement and greatly hindered their operations.
    
    Of course, there are only 5 members in Scepter of the King. Therefore they searched for experts in dealing with the infected, and cooperated with them, all in order to crush the Reunion Movement, their mortal enemy.
    
    This was the reason behind the cooperation of RotK and Rhodes Island, probably.
char_166_skfire.档案资料三:
While casting Arts, the clothes Skyfire wears often burn from the heat emitting from her body.

    This resulted in two problems, Skyfire’s body temperature is too high, though it causes her no discomfort, the objects surrounding her isn’t as lucky.
    
    The other issue is that usual fabric cannot insulate the heat. Skyfire has always been searching for replacement clothing, or perhaps a way to solve this problem permanently.
    
    Rhodes Island has attempted to modify her clothing, and all efforts has failed.
    
    And this is the second problem the genius honor student deals with.
char_166_skfire.档案资料四:
Skyfire isn’t someone prideful and vain. But to her, most people cannot understand her rapidly moving train of thoughts and farsighted planning. This resulted in gaps when communicating with her and caused her problems because of it.

    Skyfire doesn’t want to yell or be difficult, she just doesn’t know how to express her strong and only mostly calm emotions.
    
    Fortunately, she hangs out with suitable friends, Rhodes Island also has all sorts of operator, and reduces her discomfort and loneliness just by a little bit.
    
    If she really has them that is.
    
    Certain operators mentions, she would at least apologize while blushing when she accidentally burns Doctor’s mission reports.
char_166_skfire.晋升记录:
If you desire to make use of the Scepter of the King, then you should first review your capability to control them. Fact of the matter is, gems scattered around will never compare to tightly bonded steel, mature and experienced operators are more suitable compared to geniuses stringed together.

    Of course, if you are a tactical commander capable of using, or perhaps even excelling, with them, then they are a force to change the tide of the battle.
    
    Let’s just first start with this Skyfire who tend to accidentally burn her uniform.
